|effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).<br><br>If unit is within 2 spaces of a trap in Aether Raids, allies on the map can move to a space within 2 spaces of unit ("trap in Aether Raids" includes any trap—triggered, disarmed, false, or otherwise).<br><br>Allies within 2 spaces of unit can move to any space within 2 spaces of unit.<br><br>For allies within 2 spaces of unit, grants Atk/Res+5 and neutralizes penalties to Atk/Res during their combat, and restores 7 HP after combat.<br><br>If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Res = 20% of unit's Res at start of combat + 6, neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Res, deals damage = 20% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat, and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.
|required=Rexcalibur
